title: Where Chef Tiffani Faison eats in Boston when she’s not working
author: Katelyn Umholtz
bullets: Food She skips a sit-down breakfast, lives for soup, and swears by one Chinatown comfort dish.
Chef and restaurateur Tiffani Faison said one of her favorite dishes in Boston is the Szechuan white fish at Taiwan Cafe.

title: Brookline agrees to pay $3 million to woman who accused teacher of sexually abusing her
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: Local News The settlement comes after criminal charges were dropped.
"It's exceptionally difficult for people who are abused as young children to be able to go through a public proceeding about it,” her lawyer said.
A temporary banner for the newly named Roland Hayes School covers its former name, Heath School.
